refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Print the prime factors of each specified integer NUMBER. If none are specified on the command line, read them from standard input.

listitem.para: GNU coreutils online help: <http://www.gnu.org/software/coreutils/> Report factor translation bugs to <http://translationproject.org/team/>

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: Written by Paul Rubin, Torbjorn Granlund, and Niels Moller.

refsect1.title: SEE ALSO
refsect1.para: The full documentation for factor is maintained as a Texinfo manual. If the info and factor programs are properly installed at your site, the command
should give you access to the complete manual.
